TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_bahbah, title = bahbah, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/bahbah} }

S.FORM: == bahbah == 驅逐,趕走 siwkay nu bahbah nu mapalaway a kamu, mibahbah sa, mipaliyas tu tademaw saca aadupan saca dietu... tinaku a kamu bahbahan 被趕走了 / bahbahan nu pikadabuan ci Kaying. bahbahen 趕走 / bahbahen nu ama ci Kacaw! mabahbah 被趕 / mabahbah nu acawa ci Tubah kiyu milakalak i Pusung. mibahbah 驅趕 / mibahbah tu palabuway. pibahbahi 趕走 / pibahbahi tu nani' i paluday! u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika 驅逐 ​,祭師行為時的用語. mibahbah tu da'cusay a di'tu, u kamu nu kawaw nu mapalaway. .mibahbah tu de'cusay a tademaw namakay kakitizaan asaca kantal, naizawtu nay sumamaday. to drive out , referring usually to evil spirits. Deportation is the expulsion of a person or group of people from a place or country. The term expulsion is often used as a synonym for deportation, through expulsion is more often used in the context of international law, while deportation is more used in national law.

== bahbah == 驅逐,趕走 siwkay no bahbah no mapalaway a kamo, mibahbah sa, mipaliyas to tademaw saca aadopan saca dieto... tinako a kamo bahbahan 被趕走了 / bahbahan no pikadaboan ci Kaying. bahbahen 趕走 / bahbahen no ama ci Kacaw! mabahbah 被趕 / mabahbah no acawa ci Tobah kiyo milakalak i Posong. mibahbah 驅趕 / mibahbah to palaboway. pibahbahi 趕走 / pibahbahi to nani' i paloday! o solit no Holam ato Amilika 驅逐 ​,祭師行為時的用語. mibahbah to da'cosay a di'to, o kamo no kawaw no mapalaway. .mibahbah to de'cosay a tademaw namakay kakitizaan asaca kantal, naizawto nay somamaday. to drive oot , referring osoally to evil spirits. Deportation is the expolsion of a person or groop of people from a place or coontry. The term expolsion is often osed as a synonym for deportation, throogh expolsion is more often osed in the context of international law, while deportation is more osed in national law.
